Amazing_Luck.help: Boosts your Defense to all attacks by 50% for 60 seconds.
Amazing_Luck.targetHelp: Boosts your Defense to all attacks by 50% for 60 seconds.
Amazing_Luck.attackerHit: You now have {PowerName} and greatly increase your Defense.

Resistant.help: Increases all your Damage Resistance by 30% for 60 seconds. Robust also protects you from enemy Teleportation.
Resistant.targetHelp: Increases all your Damage Resistance by 30% for 60 seconds. Robust also protects you from enemy Teleportation.
Resistant.attackerHit: You are Robust and take a lot less damage from attacks and can resist enemy Teleportation.

Sight_Beyond_Sight.help: Makes your attacks 75% more accurate and increases your Perception by 75% for 60 seconds.
Sight_Beyond_Sight.targetHelp: Makes your attacks 75% more accurate and increases your Perception by 75% for 60 seconds.
Sight_Beyond_Sight.attackerHit: You have {PowerName} into your enemies' weakness and greatly increase your chance To Hit and your Perception.

Back_in_the_Fight.attackerHit: You get your {PowerName}, and gain a lot of Endurance.

Perfect_Health.help: Recovers all of your Hit Points
Perfect_Health.targetHelp: Recovers all of your Hit Points
Perfect_Health.attackerHit: You are restored to {PowerName} and gain a lot of Hit Points.

Furious_Rage.help: Increases all your damage by 100% for 60 seconds.
Furious_Rage.targetHelp: Increases all your damage by 100% for 60 seconds.
Furious_Rage.attackerHit: You are filled with {PowerName} and strike with a lot more damage.

Liberate.help: Frees you from many Sleep, Hold, Immobilization, Disorient, Fear, Confuse and KnockBack effects and boosts your resistance to Repel, Taunt and Placate effects for 90 seconds. This Inspiration can be used even while under such effects.
Liberate.targetHelp: Frees you from many Sleep, Hold, Immobilization, Disorient, Fear, Confuse and KnockBack effects and boosts your resistance to Repel, Taunt and Placate effects for 90 seconds. This Inspiration can be used even while under such effects.
Liberate.attackerHit: You are now able to Escape from most effects.

Immortal_Recovery.help: If you are defeated, you can wake up with all of your hit points. You will, have 25 Endurance, but unable to recover Endurance naturally for 10 seconds. Unlike weaker inspirations, Immortal Recovery will not leave you Disoriented, and you will be protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds.
Immortal_Recovery.targetHelp: If you are defeated, you can wake up with all of your hit points. You will, have 25 Endurance, but unable to recover Endurance naturally for 10 seconds. Unlike weaker inspirations, Immortal Recovery will not leave you Disoriented, and you will be protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds.
Immortal_Recovery.attackerHit: Your miraculous {PowerName} saves you from the brink of death. You feel a little weak and cannot do anything for a short while.

Ultimate.help: Ultimate shifts your Combat Level by 1 when compared to the Combat Level of the enemies you are fighting. You may only use one Ultimate Inspiration at a time.
Ultimate.targetHelp: Ultimate shifts your Combat Level by 1 when compared to the Combat Level of the enemies you are fighting. You may only use one Ultimate Inspiration at a time.
